The bearer takes 3% less damage for each time it has been damaged in the current battle.
After the bearer {ACTION_provokes}, this relic {ACTION_attacks} a random enemy.
When the bearer {ACTION_attacks} or {ACTION_casts} a spell, the damage has a 35% chance to be based on its Current {STAT_health} instead of {STAT_attack} or {STAT_intelligence}.
After the bearer takes damage from an attack or spell, a random enemy takes 20% of that damage as well.
The first time the bearer is killed, it resurrects with 100% {STAT_health} and gains 50% stats (other than {STAT_health}).
title: God of Strife

name: Muse
relicBonuses: At the start of battle, the bearer gains 3 stacks of {CONDNAME_MINION_ZOMBIE}.
At the start of the bearer's turn, this relic {ACTION_attacks} a random enemy for each minion the bearer has. These attacks deal 25% normal damage.

After the bearer {ACTION_attacks} or {ACTION_casts} a spell, it gains 1 stack of {CONDNAME_MINION_DIREWOLF}.
After the bearer gains {CONDNAME_MINION_ZOMBIE}, {CONDNAME_MINION_SPIDERLING}, {CONDNAME_MINION_UNSTABLEHORROR}, or {CONDNAME_MINION_DIREWOLF}, it gains one of the four horsemen minions.
At the start of the bearer's turn, it {ACTION_casts} [icons,1984]Crucifixion on a random enemy.
title: Goddess of Creation

At the start of battle, the bearer gains a random trait that belongs to its race.

After this relic {ACTION_casts} a spell, a random enemy is afflicted with a random debuff.
At the start of the bearer's turn, it gains a random minion.
After this relic {ACTION_attacks}, its master gains 20% of a random stat.
After this relic {ACTION_casts} a spell, a random enemy loses a random stat equal to 30% of the bearer's highest stat.
At the end of the bearer's turn, this relic {ACTION_casts} 1 random spell for each turn its bearer has taken in the current battle.
title: Goddess of Uncertainty

relicBonuses: At the end of each enemy's turn, this relic {ACTION_attacks} a random enemy if the bearer didn't take any damage.

The bearer gains 15% more {STAT_defense} and Maximum {STAT_health} from stat-boosting effects and can't lose these stats.
The bearer takes 30% less indirect damage.

relicBonuses: The bearer's on-attack or on-cast effects activate 1 additional time, depending on whether its {STAT_attack} or {STAT_intelligence} is higher.

This relic and its bearer deal 5% more damage for each time the bearer's on-attack or on-cast effects activated.
This relic and its bearer's on-heal, on-debuff, and on-buff effects activate 1 additional time.
The bearer's on-attack or on-cast effects activate 1 additional time for every 5 times this relic has {ACTION_attacked} or {ACTION_cast} a spell in the current battle.

relicBonuses: After the bearer {ACTION_attacks}, this relic {ACTION_attacks} the enemy as well.
